title: Remembering Chef Carl Ruiz
description:
Our good friend Chef Carl Ruiz of The Food Network, La Cubana NYC Restaurant, the Opie Radio Podcast and countless other ventures, suddenly passed away over the weekend. While we are all reeling from his death, I want to take the opportunity to celebrate Carl's amazing appearance on our other show, Watch & Listen. This episode focuses on Carl's general philosophy on watches, which I later titled, "Carl Ruins Everything." And it's the best primer on watches for someone who loves, or who hates watches. 

This episode is available as a video - get it at: https://youtu.be/VZcrVQtHbXE

Also check out his other two appearances
TST Podcast #441: Opie Hughes & Carl Ruiz
https://youtu.be/7ZFZrIU5wPI

Watch & Listen Podcast #35: History of Rolex With Carl Ruiz
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZFtN6cMzS-U

We will miss Carl very dearly, talk about him often, and remember the lessons of his life. 
RIP Chef Carl Ruiz 1975-2019 #ruizingforver
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
